title: Leader Rodgers Statement on President Biden’s Plan to Impose Harsh & Costly Mileage and Emissions Restrictions on Vehicles
description: Washington, D.C. — Republican Leader for the House Energy and Commerce Committee Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement on President Biden’s plan to impose unattainable electric vehicle goals and vehicle mileage and tailpipe emissions standards across the country.
